issue.title: Add skid steer plugin to pioneer3at model

content.raw:
for adding skid Steer drive plugin to pioneer3at robot just should uncomment the skidsteerdriveplugin or add this line  
```
<plugin name="SkidSteerDrivePlugin" filename="libSkidSteerDrivePlugin.so" />

```
in SDF file of pioneer3at robot.

if you add this plugin with 'MaxForce' tag, you should add in this way, becuase the 'MaxForce' tag is a child of 'plugin' tag.
```
<plugin name="SkidSteerDrivePlugin" filename="libSkidSteerDrivePlugin.so" >   
       <MaxForce>5.0</MaxForce>   
</plugin>
```
content.html:
for adding skid Steer drive plugin to pioneer3at robot just should uncomment the skidsteerdriveplugin or add this line 

<plugin name="SkidSteerDrivePlugin" filename="libSkidSteerDrivePlugin.so" />

in SDF file of pioneer3at robot.

if you add this plugin with 'MaxForce' tag, you should add in this way, becuase the 'MaxForce' tag is a child of 'plugin' tag.

<plugin name="SkidSteerDrivePlugin" filename="libSkidSteerDrivePlugin.so" >   
       <MaxForce>5.0</MaxForce>   
</plugin>
